title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Dave Wannstedt on Bears, Dolphins & Raiders Jobs, McCarthy Hot Seat, Russ/Seahawks Marriage, Divisional Picks
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Dave Wannstedt on Bears, Dolphins & Raiders Jobs, McCarthy Hot Seat, Russ/Seahawks Marriage, Divisional Picks
description:
Colin explains how Mike McCarthy and the Cowboys "jumped the shark" with that bonehead final play, why Matthew Stafford reminds him of a Marvel character, and why the NBA continues to get lapped by the NFL. (3:00) Then, former Bears & Dolphins HC and Cowboys DC Dave Wannstedt joins to Colin to discuss the shocking Brian Flores firing (17:00), Dave's picks for Bears head coach (24:00), why Kellen Moore isn't ready to be the Cowboys head coach (29:00), how the Seahawks can fix their Russell Wilson problem (33:00), Dave's pick for Raiders head coach (39:00), the coaching advice Kliff Kingsbury needs to hear (40:00, and their predictions for the playoff games this weekend (41:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
